chats.lastMessage: Your dog is so adorable! Is he good with other pets?
Hi there! I'm interested in your pet sitting services.

messages.message: Hi! I'm looking for someone to walk my dog this weekend.
Hello! I'd be happy to help. What breed is your dog?
He's a golden retriever named Max. Very friendly!
I love golden retrievers! When would you need the walk?
Saturday around 2pm if possible?
That works for me! How long would you like me to walk him?
About 45 minutes would be great. He loves the park nearby.
Perfect! I'll bring some treats if that's okay?
That would be wonderful! Max loves treats.
When can you come by to walk Max?
Hello! I noticed you're looking for pet care services.
Yes! I have a 2-year-old beagle who needs some company during the day.
I specialize in daytime pet sitting. Does your dog get along with other dogs?
He's very social and loves other dogs. Do you have pets of your own?
I have a friendly labrador. They should get along great!
That sounds perfect! Could we arrange a meet-and-greet first?
Your dog is so adorable! Is he good with other pets?
Hi there! I'm looking for someone to watch my cat for a week in April.
Hello! I'd be happy to help with your cat. What's their name?
Her name is Luna. She's very independent but needs someone to feed her and clean her litter.
I've cared for many cats and understand their needs. What dates in April?
April 10-17. Would you be able to visit twice daily or stay at my place?
I could do either option. What would you prefer for Luna?
Probably visits twice a day would be best. She gets anxious with new people staying over.
That makes sense. I can definitely do morning and evening visits.
Great! Would you like to meet Luna beforehand?
Hi there! I'm interested in your pet sitting services.
